Letter of Good Standing (LOGS) | Tender Documents | JG Business Compliance

Secure your tender eligibility. We retrieve your valid Letter of Good Standing directly from the Compensation Fund.

Est. Turnaround: 1-3 Days
Total Fee
RÂ 850,00

Eligibility Check

The Compensation Commissioner will only issue a LOGS if:

  • The company is registered with the Compensation Fund.
  • Your Assessment Fees are paid in full.
  • Your Return of Earnings (ROE) is up to date.
  • No outstanding debt exists on the account.

A Letter of Good Standing (LOGS) is the official confirmation that your business has met its statutory requirements under the COID Act. It is a mandatory requirement for state tenders, construction contracts, and supply chain databases.

Without this document, your business cannot apply for government work or large corporate contracts that require proof of compliance.

Get Tender Ready

We resolve administrative blocks to get your letter issued fast.

Retrieve LOGS (R850)
